column3: ……さあ"約束のパラセールを受け取るがいい
column4:
Go on... Here is the paraglider, just as
I promised.

column3: これで この台地の断崖を飛び降りられよう
column4:
With that, you should be able to safely
fly off the cliffs surrounding this area.

column3:
……

お主に伝えねばならぬ事は これで全てだ……
column4:
And...I think that's it.


I've told you everything I can...

column3: では頼んだぞ リンク……
